import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGlobalContext } from "./context"; import "./styles/Invoice.css"; import json from "./data.json"; import iconLeft from "./assets/icon-arrow-left.svg"; function Invoice() { const { chosenId, info, setInfo } = useGlobalContext(); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); json.forEach((el) => { if (el.id === chosenId) { setInfo({ ...el }); } }); }, []); const { id, createdOn, paymentDue, description, paymentTerms, clientName, clientEmail, status, senderAddress, clientAddress, items, total, } = info; console.log(info.clientAddress?.street); return (

Go back

Status

{status || "-"}

{id || "-"}

{description || "-"}

{senderAddress?.street || "-"}

{senderAddress?.city || "-"}

{senderAddress?.postCode || "-"}

{senderAddress?.country || "-"}

Invoice Date

{new Date(createdOn).toDateString() == "Invalid Date" ? "-" : new Date(createdOn).toDateString().slice(4)}

Payment Due

{new Date(paymentDue).toDateString() == "Invalid Date" ? "-" : new Date(paymentDue).toDateString().slice(4)}

Bill To

{clientName || "-"}

{clientAddress?.street || "-"}

{clientAddress?.city || "-"}

{clientAddress?.postCode || "-"}

{clientAddress?.country || "-"}

Sent To

{clientEmail || "-"}

{items?.map((el) => { return (

{el?.name}

{`${el?.quantity}x\$${el?.price}`}

${el?.total}

); }) ||

No items found

}

Total

${total || "0.00"}

); } export default Invoice;
